Package edu.cornell.library.scholars.webapp.controller.api.distribute.rdf.graphbuilder

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphBuilder
    Creates a local RDF graph to be distributed, or to use as the context for queries.
    ThreadsafeGraphBuilder
    TODO Marker interface asserting that the GraphBuilder may be called by several threads at once without conflict
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSparqlBindingGraphBuilder
    Keep track of the binding details for DataDistributors that bind request parameters into SPARQL queries.
    CascadingRequestsGraphBuilder
    TODO Iterate like a drillDown, (how much code in common?).
    ConstructQueryGraphBuilder
    Run one or more construct queries to build the graph.
    DrillDownGraphBuilder
    A decorator that runs one or more subordinate graph builders zero or more times, based the results of a SPARQL SELECT query.
    EmptyGraphBuilder
    Creates an empty RDF graph.
    GraphBuilderUtilities
    Helpful classes and methods for dealing with GraphBuilders.
    GraphBuilderUtilities.EnhancedDataDistributionContext  
    GraphBuilderUtilities.GraphBuilders
    Run a collection of GraphBuilders and produce a merged result.
    IteratingGraphBuilder
    A decorator that runs one or more subordinate graph builders multiple times, modifying the map of request parameters each time.
    ParallelGraphBuilder
    TODO Iterate like the drill-down builder (share code?) Each sub-request is handled by a thread-pool, whose size can be configured.
